EmailTemplate.name: VMUG Chicago follow up.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: VMUG Chicago Follow Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, Thanks for taking the time to come by and see us at the VMware User Group in Chicago. As a follow-up to the event, I've linked below a few of the many resources designed to dive deeper into the ways VMTurbo will dramatically improve how you control and automate your virtual data center.
- Trial Download <http://bit.ly/QzvQgM> - check out VMTurbo in your environment, absolutely free - Whitepaper <http://bit.ly/17GQhjy> on optimizing workload configurations in your virtual environment
My team will be following up with you shortly to understand your priorities and interest in learning more about VMTurbo.
Sincerely, Brady Lenahan
